name: Post Ideas
author: Aaron Robbins

sections.description:
Manage and keep track of your blog article or post ideas.

Download now!

Some features:

  • Manges post ideas
  • Sort ideas by name, priority or date
  • Track keywords and research urls

  • Edit, Delete or Write options

  • Support
sections.installation:
1. Unzip only the postideas.php file into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory. If you’re uploading it make sure to upload
    the top-level folder. Don’t just upload all the php files and put them in /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the Post Ideas plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Visit Manage > Post Ideas to begin entering ideas for your next articles.
  4. If the script fails to install the required mysql table please use the included wp_btpi.sql file and import it to your
    wordpress database using phpMyAdmin (if your table prefix is not wp_ you will need to change it in the sql file)

short_description: Keeps track of all your blog article or post ideas including a working title, possible keywords, source links and descriptions.
